name: Japanese Potato Salad
author: Haven4Order
summary: Potato salad with an Asian flair.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons Japanese mayonnaise, or more to taste
directions: Place sliced cucumber in a bowl and sprinkle with a bit of salt
Let sit until tender, about 5 minutes
Squeeze cucumber to remove excess water
Place drained cucumber in a small bowl
Place potatoes in a pot and rinse to remove extra starch
Place pot over high heat and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium and cook until potatoes are tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Transfer cooked eggs to a bowl filled with cold water
Drain potatoes well and return them to the empty pot
Season with salt and black pepper and mash potatoes while still hot; leave some chunks for texture
Peel eggs, cut into chunks, and add to the pot with the potatoes
Add cucumber, imitation crab, and corn
Add mayonnaise, vinegar, salt, and black pepper to taste
Chill potato salad before serving, about 30 minutes
